/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sun is shining brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The road itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of natural beauty and urban development.
